title: Does the gym trainer actually do something?
content:
I'm from ec campus and I've never set foot in gym and I don't know how the equipment works.
But I want to join
Will the trainer be available to help out?

comments.body: I too wanted to know if a gym trainer is available at PES EC campus
If you ask him to train you he will because most people prefer doing their own workouts so he doesn't bother them.
Just join a regular gym instead of PES gym.

I mean they're always there to guide or help someone , you can even ask them about diet or form regarding any exercise. Altho, you won't really need much help after a few days/weeks and you can also consult a friend or other people in the gym.

I go to the gym in RR and trainers actually care if you speak with them

If you donâ€™t speak with them, they mind their own business.

The trainer is good in EC campus 
He will help you with your workouts 
But I also heard that he has been fired
